text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I started as a trainer here at Tracen<n>Academy only a few
days ago.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's peaceful watching the students<n>practice while I
fantasize about my<n>own glorious days to come...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm hopeful that I'll soon become<n>someone's trainer, and
help them<n>grow into an excellent racer. That is,<n>until...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: URRRAAAGH! OUTTA MY WAY!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huff... pant... Crud... Where areya?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Barnacles! I don't see 'em! I'm<n>positive my Golshi Radar
was pinging<n>in this direction...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Radar alert... Radar alert... Trainersignal detected.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
No doubt—that's a radar ping, all right!<n>There's a trainer
somewhere close<n>by!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
But... where? If I remember right,<n>trainers are green
creatures with big,<n>pointy fangs...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ah-ha!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I make eye contact with the oddball<n>student... I've got a bad
feeling about<n>this.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, you there. You're a trainer,<n>right?
choice_data_list: Well, I don't have green skin or pointy fangs...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Whaddya mean? You're<n>wearing a trainer badge, so
that<n>makes you a trainer, doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Geez, you need to quit the nonsense.<n>You might get
kidnapped by students<n>looking to be scouted...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: —Students like me! The esteemed<n>Gold Ship!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Resistance is futile! No way I'm<n>letting a wild trainer run
free!<n>RAAAGH!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The one who calls herself Gold Ship<n>is getting way too
close! This could be<n>dangerous!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I might be in actual danger—I'd better<n>get out of here, fast!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ah! Hey, you! Hold it right there!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I manage to escape behind the main<n>hall. It seems I've lost
her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: What was that all about?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Excuse me... Are you all right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You're quite out of breath. Did<n>something happen?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Goodness, Gold Ship was?! Well,<n>how should I put this...
You have my<n>sympathies.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have to ask—how is it that you found<n>yourself in such a
predicament?
choice_data_list: I think she's looking for a trainer...
I think she's looking for a trainer...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That makes sense... You see, she has<n>a strong desire to
debut and start<n>racing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Having a trainer is an essential step<n>to running in official
races.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Gold Ship, however, hasn't found one<n>yet. Or rather... how
should I put this?<n>She can't hold on to one.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, in her efforts to find a<n>trainer, she's likely resorted
to trying<n>to kidnap one...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It seems like Gold Ship is a real<n>troublemaker around the
school.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She seriously wants to race, which is<n>great and all, but I
can't imagine I'd<n>be able to handle her...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: URAAAAGH! Where's that wild<n>trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh no... I think she's caught up to<n>you!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I can't get embroiled in this mess, so<n>you'll have to pardon
me. Do try your<n>best to stay safe!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: GRAAAAAARGH! Where are you?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not good! I gotta make a break for it! I<n>hope she doesn't
see me...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oho! A wild trainer appears! ♪

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You're mine now—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Swoosh!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woohoooo! A successful hunt!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Aww, don't wuss out on me now.<n>It's not like I caught you
to fill my belly<n>or anything.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I'm just gonna take you on a<n>teensy-weensy, kinda-huge<n>
adventure. Now that you're caught up<n>on the details, all
aboard!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Still crammed in a bag, I get carried off<n>to who knows
where...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Several hours later...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Ding ding! What a day! Bright an'<n>shiny! This is the perfect
weather to<n>search for treasure!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Okey dokey, Golshi's super...<n>exciting... awesome treasure
hunt<n>begins... NOW!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: What the... Where am I?! To becontinued
